title: Diff Eq Given Slope expression part - a

content.question: Write an equation of the line tangent to the graph of f at the point where x = 2 and use it to approximate f(1.8).

frqParts.text: Write an equation of the line tangent to the graph of f at the point where x = 2 and use it to approximate f(1.8).

topic.text: 4.6: Approximating Values of a Function Using Local Linearity and Linearization

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Identify an appropriate mathematical rule or procedure based on the relationship between concepts (e.g., rate of change and accumulation) or processes (e.g., differentiation and its inverse process, anti-differentiation) to solve problems.
